text.cn: 可以通过完成任务、世界探索等方式获得行动资历，<@ld.key>提升管理员的权限等阶</>。
text.en: Earn Operational EXP by completing missions and exploring the world. Operational EXP is used to raise your <@ld.key>Endministrator Authority Level</>.

text.cn: <@ld.key>提升权限等阶</>不仅可以增加理智上限，而且可以获得装备制造模板、嵌晶玉等奖励。
text.en: <@ld.key>Raising Authority Levels</> gives a higher Sanity limit as well as rewards such as gear templates and Oroberyls.

text.cn: 有些<@ld.key>活性醚质</>会扭曲周围空间光线，需要通过扫描才能够发现获取。
text.en: Some <@ld.key>Active Aurylene</> distort light around themselves. Scanning is required to reveal its actual location.

text.cn: 修复<@ld.key>故障机器人</>时，可以切换图示和数字两种显示模式。
text.en: When <@ld.key>repairing robots</>, one can switch between graphics or numerical display modes.

text.cn: 管理员可以在维修灵感点回忆起<@ld.key>新的电路修复技巧。</>
text.en: Find Repair Logic locations to remember <@ld.key>new circuit repairing techniques</>, Endmin.

text.cn: <@ld.key>射流无人机</>在消耗液体时，<@ld.key>空瓶子会返回至背包中</>，管理员记得留够背包空间。
text.en: Once the <@ld.key>jet drone</> finishes spraying the fluid, the <@ld.key>empty bottle will be returned to the Backpack</>. Try to leave enough space in the Backpack, Endmin.

text.cn: <@ld.key>击飞、倒地效果</>产生时会对敌人造成额外的失衡效果。
text.en: When triggered, <@ld.key>Lift and Knock Down</> deals additional Stagger on the enemy.

text.cn: 部分干员的战技不适合在某些情况下使用，此时<@ld.key>战技图标会略微变暗</>作为提示。
text.en: Some operators' battle skills cannot be used in certain situations. When that happens, their <@ld.key>battle skill icons will be slightly darkened</> as a reminder.

text.cn: 强力的敌人通常拥有<@ld.key>失衡节点</>，当失衡值到达失衡节点时，其行为会立即被打断。
text.en: Strong enemies usually have <@ld.key>Stagger Nodes</>. Build up enough Stagger to reach the Stagger Nodes to interrupt these enemies.

text.cn: 干员也会受到来自敌人的<@ld.key>法术异常</>（燃烧、冻结、导电、腐蚀）效果，一些战术物品可以快速清除异常效果。
text.en: Enemies can also apply <@ld.key>Arts Reaction</> debuffs (Combustion, Solidification, Electrification, and Corrosion) on operators. Some tacticals are designed to quickly remove these debuffs.

text.cn: 干员对敌人<@ld.key>处决</>的动作期间，不会受到任何伤害。
text.en: Operators will not take any DMG when performing <@ld.key>finishers</> on enemies.

text.cn: 若想快速造成<@ld.key>法术异常</>效果，在队伍里<@ld.key>编入其他属性的干员</>不妨是一个好的选择。
text.en: To quickly trigger <@ld.key>Arts Reactions</>, having a team with <@ld.key>operators of different Arts elements</> will be a good solution.

text.cn: <@ld.key>“突击”职业干员</>通常拥有强大的输出能力，但作为代价会依赖其他干员提供输出环境。
text.en: <@ld.key>Strikers</> are operators with powerful DMG-dealing capabilities, but they need other operators to create DMG-dealing opportunities for them.

text.cn: <@ld.key>“近卫”和“术师”职业干员</>既能造成各种<@ld.key>物理异常和法术异常效果</>，又有一定<@ld.key>输出能力</>，是非常均衡的多面手。
text.en: <@ld.key>Guards and casters</> are very well-rounded operators who can apply various <@ld.key>Physical Statuses and Arts Reactions</> while being decent <@ld.key>DMG-dealers</>.

text.cn: 若在战斗中需要<@ld.key>保护和治疗，</>管理员可以尝试在队伍里<@ld.key>编入“重装”或“辅助”职业干员。</>
text.en: Add <@ld.key>defender or supporter</> operators into the team as they offer <@ld.key>protection and HP treatment</> during combat, Endmin.

text.cn: 若常常感觉<@ld.key>技力</>捉襟见肘，管理员可以尝试在队伍里<@ld.key>编入“先锋”职业干员。</>
text.en: If the team is always short on <@ld.key>Skill Points (SP)</>, try adding <@ld.key>vanguard</> operators into the team for faster SP recovery.

text.cn: 部分干员在施放终结技时，会<@ld.key>主动切换为主控干员</>。
text.en: When casting the ultimates of certain operators, they will <@ld.key>automatically become the controlled operator</>.

text.cn: 干员的<@ld.key>重击</>攻击既能造成失衡，又能恢复技力。多多利用会使战斗更加轻松。
text.en: Try to complete the operators' basic attack sequences. The last sequence, <@ld.key>Final Strike</>, deals Stagger and recovers SP.

text.cn: <@ld.key>合理地把技力分配给不同的干员</>，通常比反复施放相同战技的效果更佳。
text.en: Try to <@ld.key>distribute SP usage amongst different operators</>. This is often more effective than repeatedly casting the same battle skill.

text.cn: 通常情况下，<@ld.key>终结技能量</>可以通过<@ld.key>施放全队任意干员战技</>以及<@ld.key>施放自身连携技</>获取。
text.en: Usually, an operator gains <@ld.key>Ultimate Energy</> when <@ld.key>any operator in the team casts a battle skill</> or <@ld.key>when the operator's combo skill is cast</>.

text.cn: <@ld.key>法术附着</>最多可以叠加至4层。部分干员的技能会随附着层数的叠加而增强。
text.en: Up to 4 stacks of <@ld.key>Arts Inflictions</> can be applied. The skills of some operators are enhanced against an enemy with more stacks of Arts Infliction.

text.cn: <@ld.key>相同属性的法术</>附着在叠加时，会产生<@ld.key>法术爆发</>效果，可以对敌人造成额外伤害。
text.en: Stacking <@ld.key>Arts Inflictions of the same element</> triggers <@ld.key>Arts Bursts</> that can deal extra DMG to enemies.

text.cn: 触发<@ld.key>法术异常</>时，目标的法术附着层数越多，法术异常效果就越强，效果持续时间也越长。
text.en: When triggering an <@ld.key>Arts Reaction</>, the more Arts Infliction stacks the target has, the more powerful the effects and the longer the duration of the said Arts Reaction.

text.cn: <@ld.key>破防</>效果最多可以叠加至4层。部分干员的技能会随破防层数的叠加而增强。
text.en: Up to 4 stacks of <@ld.key>Vulnerability</> can be applied. The skills of some operators are enhanced against an enemy with more stacks of Vulnerability.

text.cn: 造成<@ld.key>击飞、倒地</>时不仅<@ld.key>不会消耗破防层数</>，还会<@ld.key>叠加1层</>破防层数。
text.en: Triggering <@ld.key>Lift and Knock Down</> does <@ld.key>not consume any Vulnerability stacks</>, but <@ld.key>adds 1 stack</> of Vulnerability instead.

text.cn: <@ld.key>猛击</>会消耗敌人身上所有的破防层数，并<@ld.key>根据被消耗的层数</>对敌人<@ld.key>造成大量物理伤害。</>
text.en: <@ld.key>Crush</> consumes all Vulnerability stacks on the enemy, and deals <@ld.key>massive Physical DMG</> based on the <@ld.key>number of stacks consumed</>.

text.cn: <@ld.key>碎甲</>会消耗敌人身上所有破防层数，并<@ld.key>根据被消耗的层数使敌人在后续一段时间内受到的物理伤害提高。</>
text.en: <@ld.key>Breach</> consumes all Vulnerability stacks on the enemy, and makes the <@ld.key>enemy temporarily take more Physical DMG based on the number of stacks consumed</>.

text.cn: 全队处于"连击"状态时，任意干员的下次战技或终结技都会消耗连击状态。
text.en: When the team has a Link buff, the next battle skill or ultimate cast (can be any operator) will consume the buff.

text.cn: 敌人在<@ld.key>蓄力</>时（身体周围出现红色圈特效时）十分脆弱，使用技能将其打断能对敌人造成重创。
text.en: Enemies will be exposed when they are <@ld.key>charging up</> for a skill (indicated by the shrinking red circle). Interrupt them with a skill to deal heavy damage.

text.cn: 不同干员<@ld.key>连携技</>的触发条件不同，多多了解会让战斗事半功倍。
text.en: Different operators have different <@ld.key>combo skill</> triggers. Know these triggers to make battles easier.

text.cn: 装备战术物品后，干员们会根据不同情况<@ld.key>自动使用战术物品</>。
text.en: Operators will automatically use <@ld.key>equipped tacticals</> according to the situation.

text.cn: <@ld.key>冲刺或闪避</>后，短时间内继续进攻会衔接上一段普通攻击。
text.en: For a short period after <@ld.key>dashing or dodging</>, the next basic attack performed will continue from the previous sequence.

text.cn: 在<@ld.key>恰当的时机成功闪避</>敌人的攻击后，可以返还一部分闪避时消耗的体力并恢复少量技力。
text.en: <@ld.key>Successfully dodging the enemy's attack at the right timing</> restores some of the Stamina spent by the dodge and recovers some SP.

text.cn: 部分敌人的攻击可以通过<@ld.key>跳跃</>来躲避。
text.en: Some enemy attacks can be evaded by <@ld.key>jumping</>.

text.cn: 部分干员的战技会因某些条件而获得强化，此时<@ld.key>战技图标会高亮</>作为提示。
text.en: Some operators' battle skills can be enhanced when certain criteria are met. When that happens, their <@ld.key>battle skill icons will be highlighted</> as a reminder.

text.cn: 当干员提升至一定等级后可以进行<@ld.key>精英化</>。干员的精英化阶段越高，所获得的能力越强。
text.en: Operators can be <@ld.key>promoted</> to higher ranks when they reach a certain level. Higher ranked operators also have stronger skills.

text.cn: 在能力扩延里，当干员达到一定精英化阶段后，可以学习<@ld.key>专属的基建技能与天赋技能。</>
text.en: After promoting your operators, you can use the Ability Matrix to learn <@ld.key>special Infra Skills and Talent Skills</>.

text.cn: 每位干员都有一项<@ld.key>主能力</>，提升干员的主能力值能提供<@ld.key>额外的属性加成</>。
text.en: Every operator has a <@ld.key>main attribute</>. Raise their main attribute to get <@ld.key>additional stat bonuses</>.

text.cn: 和过高等级的敌人战斗是一项严峻的挑战。如果战斗遇到困难，不妨去提升一下干员们的等级吧。
text.en: Fighting enemies many levels above you will be a challenge. If battles get too difficult, take the time to level up your operators instead.

text.cn: 晋升干员的<@ld.key>精英化阶段</>，可解锁干员的<@ld.key>技能等级上限</>。记得去提升干员的技能等级吧。
text.en: <@ld.key>Promote your operators</> to unlock <@ld.key>higher skill level caps</>. Don't forget to level up the skills of promoted operators.

text.cn: 塔卫二上有很多东西可以被<@ld.key>采集或被破坏</>，管理员不妨多做尝试。
text.en: Many things on Talos-II are <@ld.key>gatherable and/or destructible</>. It never hurts to hit random objects a few times, Endmin.

text.cn: 武陵地区的不少装置都和“水”息息相关，<@ld.key>射流无人机</>会成为探索周边环境的好帮手。
text.en: Many mechanisms and machines in Wuling are associated with water. The <@ld.key>jet drone</> will be a great assistant when exploring the environments of this region.

text.cn: 跟随引路蝴蝶往往能找到意外收获。
text.en: Follow the guiding butterflies for unexpected rewards.

text.cn: 动力竹筏连通着武陵各处，请相信它的安全性——选择目的地，然后安然享受途中美景即可。
text.en: Powered bamboo rafts can carry travelers to various locations in Wuling. Trust in their safety. Simply select the destination and enjoy the scenery along the way.

text.cn: 帮助吐虫长股兽们传递<@ld.key>萤火虫</>，说不定能有意外收获。
text.en: Help bugspitting lankybeasts pass on the <@ld.key>glowbugs</> for unexpected rewards.

text.cn: 武陵城的水渠中似有异动，其中说不定藏着什么有用的东西。
text.en: Strange things are happening to the canals in Wuling City. They might be hiding something useful.

text.cn: <@ld.key>传说，天井院水下藏着珍宝。</>
text.en: <@ld.key>Rumors speak of valuables hidden beneath the waters of Tianjing Courtyard.</>

text.cn: <@ld.key>三到钟</>能够针对侵蚀灾害发出预警，可千万不要让它出现故障。
text.en: The <@ld.key>Bell of Three Presences</> is an early warning system against Blight disasters. Do not let it break down.

text.cn: 总有天师学徒苦恼于<@ld.key>选剑局的出师仪式</>，遇到的话，不妨帮帮他们吧。
text.en: Some Tianshi disciples are very nervous about their <@ld.key>HS.Swords graduation ceremonies</>. If you meet them, try helping them out.

text.cn: <@ld.key>天井院</>外，岩壁之中，隐有怒吼不绝……
text.en: Strange angry roars emanate from the rocky walls outside <@ld.key>Tianjing Courtyard</>.

text.cn: 据说有位胆小的巡卫对<@ld.key>迷踪林</>有着独特的看法。
text.en: A timid watchguard has made quite a unique observation about <@ld.key>Stragglers Grove</>.

text.cn: 如果建造集成工业系统或培养干员时缺少某种材料，不妨多去<@ld.key>探索与采集</>，可能会有意外收获。
text.en: If you need certain materials for the AIC Factory or operator progression, try <@ld.key>exploring and gathering</>. You might get lucky.

text.cn: 获取植物种子后可以进行<@ld.key>种植</>，某些特殊植物只能通过<@ld.key>试验田块</>精心培育获得。
text.en: Acquire seeds or other seeding materials to <@ld.key>plant</> them. Some special species can only be grown by planting them at <@ld.key>test plots</>.

text.cn: 采集所得的材料可以通过<@ld.key>简易制作</>或<@ld.key>集成工业系统</>加工成各种产物，助力管理员探索和战斗。
text.en: Use <@ld.key>Crafting</> or <@ld.key>AIC Factory facilities</> to process gathered materials into products that are useful for exploration and combat.

text.cn: 塔卫二中，<@ld.key>部分采集物</>被采集后会随着时间再次出现，管理员可反复采集。
text.en: <@ld.key>Some gatherables</> of Talos-II regenerate over time. Visit them after a while to gather them again.

text.cn: 留意长耳兽的窝和那些巨大的源石虫壳，它们周围会长出<@ld.key>稀有采集物</>。
text.en: Keep an eye out for long-ear dens and giant Originium Slug Shells. <@ld.key>Rare gatherables</> would often spawn around them.

text.cn: <@ld.key>武陵地区</>设置着许多压力板，不妨试试对其使用<@ld.key>下落攻击</>，可能会有意想不到的收获。
text.en: <@ld.key>Pressure plates</> can be found in Wuling. Perform <@ld.key>dive attacks</> to activate them. Solving these puzzles might provide unexpected rewards.

text.cn: 遇到<@ld.key>光学雾影</>时，想要拨云见日，不妨试试攻击一下吧。
text.en: If a mass of <@ld.key>optical fog</> blocks the way, try attacking to dispel it.

text.cn: <@ld.key>穿戴装备</>能够<@ld.key>显著提高干员的属性</>，提升作战能力。
text.en: <@ld.key>Equip gear</> to <@ld.key>significantly improve the operator's stats</> and combat capabilities.

text.cn: 穿戴多件<@ld.key>同一套装类型</>的装备后，能够激活装备<@ld.key>套组效果</>，为干员提供额外的战斗能力。
text.en: Equip multiple pieces of gear from the <@ld.key>same set</> to activate <@ld.key>set effects</> that further boost your operator's combat performance.

text.cn: 获取<@ld.key>装备制造模板</>后，只要所需制造材料充足，即可制造。
text.en: Acquiring a <@ld.key>gear template</> lets you assemble that piece of gear, as long as you have the materials required.

text.cn: 部分<@ld.key>装备制造模板</>可通过提升权限等阶获取，部分需要<@ld.key>通过世界探索发现</>。
text.en: Some <@ld.key>gear templates</> can be acquired by raising the Endministrator's Authority Level. Others can be <@ld.key>found by exploring the world</>.

text.cn: 通过<@ld.key>装备精锻</>可<@ld.key>提升金色品质装备属性上限</>，为干员提供更强助力。
text.en: <@ld.key>Gear artificing</> can further <@ld.key>raise the stats of gold quality gear</> and make them more powerful for your operators.

text.cn: <@ld.key>耗费属性初始值更高的装备</>进行装备精锻，会有更高概率精锻成功。
text.en: Perform gear artificing by <@ld.key>consuming gear with higher base stats</> to improve the odds of successful artificing.

text.cn: 贵重物品库中的装备可以<@ld.key>分解</>，分解后将返还对应的<@ld.key>地区调度券</>。
text.en: Gear in the Valuables Stash can be <@ld.key>disassembled</> to return a corresponding sum of <@ld.key>regional stock bills</>.

text.cn: 如果地区的<@ld.key>用电功率</>超过<@ld.key>发电功率</>，就会持续消耗<@ld.key>存储电能</>；存储电能耗尽后，设备会因电力不足而自动停止工作。
text.en: Regional power reserves will be consumed if AIC <@ld.key>Power Consumption</> exceeds the <@ld.key>Power Output</>. Once the <@ld.key>reserves</> are depleted, facilities will be forced to shut down due to insufficient electrical power.

text.cn: 即使蓝图<@ld.key>所需的设备数量不足</>，也可先以<@ld.key>待建设模式</>将蓝图布置在场地中，后续制造并提交待建造设备后即可完成蓝图建造。
text.en: If a blueprint <@ld.key>requires more facilities than currently owned</>, it can still be placed with the missing facilities placed as <@ld.key>Unconstructed</> placeholders. Construct and submit the facilities afterwards to complete placing the blueprint.

text.cn: 生产各类<@ld.key>电池</>，可以为<@ld.key>作战设备</>灵活供电，或用于热能池发电。
text.en: Produce various <@ld.key>batteries</> to power <@ld.key>combat facilities</> or fuel Thermal Banks to generate power.

text.cn: 可以在集成核心区域附近的<@ld.key>集成管家</>处<@ld.key>升级集成核心区域</>，扩大区域面积，提升生产能力。
text.en: Go to the <@ld.key>AIC Steward</> near the Core AIC Area for <@ld.key>Core AIC Area upgrades</> that include area expansions for higher productivity.

text.cn: 灵活使用传送带和无线传输，实现<@ld.key>全自动化生产。</>
text.en: Make clever use of transport belts and belt-free transfer to <@ld.key>automate production</> in the AIC Factory.

text.cn: 集成工业系统的产出涉及到方方面面，尽快研究更多的工业技术，不仅有助于<@ld.key>世界探索</>，还可以提升<@ld.key>干员实力</>。
text.en: The AIC Factory produces all sorts of things. Research AIC technology quickly to support <@ld.key>exploration</> efforts and improve the <@ld.key>operators' performance</>.

text.cn: 通过完成<@ld.key>模拟空间</>，可快速掌握集成工业系统的<@ld.key>设备使用方法</>。
text.en: Complete <@ld.key>simulations</> to quickly master the ways of <@ld.key>using AIC Factory facilities</>.

text.cn: <@ld.key>作战设备</>可辅助管理员<@ld.key>战斗</>，通过研究相关的工业技术，可以获得更强力的作战设备。
text.en: <@ld.key>Combat facilities</> offer support in <@ld.key>combat</>. Research AIC Factory technologies to get more powerful combat facilities, Endmin.

text.cn: 通过<@ld.key>研究</>更多的工业技术，可制造更精良的装备，显著<@ld.key>提升干员的作战能力</>。
text.en: <@ld.key>Research</> more AIC Factory technologies to assemble better gear and significantly <@ld.key>improve the operators' combat performances</>.

text.cn: 完成<@ld.key>模拟空间</>可以获得<@ld.key>系统蓝图</>，蓝图可以帮助管理员快速布置设备产线。
text.en: Complete <@ld.key>simulations</> to acquire <@ld.key>system blueprints</>. Use blueprints to quickly lay down AIC Factory production lines.

text.cn: 在<@ld.key>俯瞰模式</>下，可对多个设备进行<@ld.key>批量框选。</>框选后可以批量复制、批量移动、批量拆除，或保存为蓝图。
text.en: In <@ld.key>Top View Mode</>, multiple facilities can be selected with <@ld.key>box selection</>. Once selected, various bulk actions can be performed, including: copying, moving, stashing, or saving as a blueprint.

text.cn: 可与好友<@ld.key>分享蓝图</>与<@ld.key>共享设备</>，帮助好友进行集成工业建设。
text.en: <@ld.key>Blueprints</> and <@ld.key>facilities</> can be shared with friends to help them with AIC Factory building.

text.cn: 达到一定<@ld.key>探索等级</>后，能量淤积点将转变为<@ld.key>重度能量淤积点</>，击败淤积点的敌人可以获取大量武器基质。
text.en: Reaching a certain <@ld.key>Exploration Level</> converts Energy Alluvium into <@ld.key>Severe Energy Alluvium</>. Defeat enemies of these alluvium sites to acquire plenty of weapon essences.

text.cn: <@ld.key>终末地工业</>是一家致力于开拓与建设的独立企业机构。
text.en: <@ld.key>Endfield Industries</> is an independent company that focuses largely in frontier construction projects.

text.cn: <@ld.key>协议源石</>因超域能量与源石对彼此的影响而诞生。
text.en: <@ld.key>Protocol-Originium</> is a product of Æther energy and Originium crystals.

text.cn: <@ld.key>环塔商会</>是塔卫二影响力最大的企业联合组织。
text.en: <@ld.key>Talos-II General Chamber of Commerce (TGCC)</> is the most influential corporate conglomerate of Talos-II.

text.cn: <@ld.key>天使</>不存在怜悯之心。
text.en: The <@ld.key>Aggeloi</> know no mercy.

text.cn: <@ld.key>“深度”</>是一种标示超域影响程度的通用测量指标。
text.en: <@ld.key>Depth</> is a standard measurement index to numerically represent the degree of Æther influence.

text.cn: <@ld.key>侵蚀</>是一种与超域相关的神秘现象。
text.en: The <@ld.key>Blight</> is a form of mysterious Æther-related phenomenon.

text.cn: <@ld.key>源石</>是一种蕴含能量的结晶矿物，是人类生存于塔卫二的基础。
text.en: <@ld.key>Originium</> is an energy-rich crystalline mineral. It is the basis of human civilization and survival in Talos-II.

text.cn: <@ld.key>寂语修会</>是由拉特兰派遣至塔卫二的技术研修组织，当前着力于研究前文明的遗产。
text.en: The <@ld.key>Cabal of Tranquility</> is a technology research organization on Talos-II dispatched by Laterano. They are currently focused on studying the Precursors' legacies.

text.cn: <@ld.key>塞什卡</>是萨卡兹在塔卫二的代表机构，他们拥有特别的空中据点。
text.en: <@ld.key>Seš'qa</> is the organization representing the Sarkaz of Talos-II. They have a special flying base.

text.cn: <@ld.key>众生长地</>是一群行走于荒地，探寻“如何与塔卫二共存”的游牧流浪者。
text.en: The <@ld.key>Hannabit Circuit</> is a band of nomadic herders in the wildlands who seek "the means of co-existing with Talos-II".

text.cn: <@ld.key>罗德岛</>——自泰拉时期延续至今的制药公司，如今将自己隐匿了起来，少有人知道他们在塔卫二的使命。
text.en: <@ld.key>Rhodes Island</> is a pharmaceutical company that dates back to the Age of Terra. The company has now secluded itself. Very few know about their mission in Talos-II.

text.cn: 小型化、模块化、自动化是<@ld.key>集成工业系统</>的核心优势。
text.en: Miniaturization, modularization, and automation are the core advantages of the <@ld.key>Automated Industry Complex (AIC)</>.

text.cn: <@ld.key>再旅者</>是由源石创造出的生命，是重现自源石森林的信息碎片。
text.en: <@ld.key>Reconveners</> are living beings created by Originium, a re-manifestation of data shards of the Originium Woods.

text.cn: <@ld.key>宏山科学院</>几乎凭一己之力满足了整个文明环带的食品需求。
text.en: Food security in the Civilization Band is almost single-handedly guaranteed by the <@ld.key>Hongshan Academy of Sciences (HAS)</>.

text.cn: 大部分<@ld.key>裂地者</>十分危险，但其中也有部分人可以沟通。
text.en: Most <@ld.key>Landbreakers</> are dangerous, but some of them might entertain the idea of negotiation.

text.cn: 在塔卫二，人类<@ld.key>预防和治疗矿石病</>的水平已大大提高。
text.en: The quality and efficacy of <@ld.key>Oripathy prevention and treatment</> have been greatly improved in Talos-II.

text.cn: 高天之上，气态巨行星<@ld.key>“塔罗斯”</>依旧谜团重重。
text.en: <@ld.key>Talos</>, the gas giant hanging in the skies of Talos-II, remains a great mystery.

text.cn: <@ld.key>塔卫二</>是气态巨行星“塔罗斯”的天然卫星之一。
text.en: <@ld.key>Talos-II</> is a natural satellite of the gas giant named Talos.

text.cn: <@ld.key>联盟工团</>是塔卫二上规模独一无二的巨型工人自治团体。
text.en: The <@ld.key>UWST</> is a giant union of self-governing worker syndicates unmatched in scale on Talos-II.

text.cn: <@ld.key>铁誓军</>是致力于从天使的威胁中守护人类的军事组织。
text.en: The <@ld.key>Order of Steel Oath</> is a military organization wholly devoted to defending humanity against the Aggeloid threat.

text.cn: 有心事的人啊，会把说不清道不明的思绪封装进精美的信封里，静静地等待与另一颗心碰撞的瞬间。
text.en: People with things on their minds often jot their confused emotions and feelings down, then seal them up in intricate envelopes. They would quietly wait for the moment when distant hearts collide.

text.cn: 过去的记忆仍未恢复。但一道神秘的痕迹，把管理员引向了未知之处……
text.en: Though past memories have yet to be recovered, a mysterious trail is leading the Endministrator towards the unknown...

text.cn: 为了信守共同寻找记忆的承诺，管理员设法再度进入协议空间，寻找莱万汀的踪迹。
text.en: To fulfill a promise made to a fellow seeker of memories, the Endministrator made another dive into the Protocol Space and started a search for Laevatain.

text.cn: 为了探明狼群叛徒的内情，狼卫和管理员与嫌疑重重的乔万尼相互试探了一路……如今，这场戏剧即将在此迎来落幕。
text.en: To unveil the truth behind the traitor of the Pack, the Endministrator, Wulfgard, and the rather suspicious Giovanni performed some scouting... This dramatic episode is about to meet its conclusion.

text.cn: 伊冯觉得涂鸦还不够完美。她暂时放下作品，邀请管理员一同前往地下车间……那里有她想“呐喊”的东西吗？
text.en: Yvonne thinks her graffiti is far from perfect. She thus takes a pause from her work and invites the Endministrator to an underground workshop... Maybe there's something that she wants to "scream" about down there.

text.cn: 当管理员拾取过一次新物品后，再次掉落此类物品时<@ld.key>同伴会帮忙一起拾取</>。
text.en: After picking up a new item, other <@ld.key>teammates will help pick the item up</> when it drops again.

text.cn: 进行<@ld.key>据点交易、物资调度</>等方式可获得大量所在地区的<@ld.key>调度券</>，以用于<@ld.key>购买物资、建设地区或提升地区建设等级</>等。
text.en: Engage in <@ld.key>outpost trading and stock redistribution</> to earn vast sums of regional <@ld.key>stock bills</>. This currency can be spent to <@ld.key>purchase supplies, support regional development, and increase regional development levels</>.

text.cn: <@ld.key>弹性需求物资</>的价格会<@ld.key>每天发生波动</>。可在价格较低时买入，在价格较高时出售以获取更多调度券。
text.en: The prices of <@ld.key>elastic goods</> <@ld.key>fluctuate on a daily basis</>. Buy low and sell high to earn more stock bills.

text.cn: 使用<@ld.key>调度券</>解锁和升级仓储节点可以<@ld.key>增加本地仓库的仓储容量上限</>。
text.en: Spend <@ld.key>stock bills</> to unlock and upgrade depot nodes to expand the <@ld.key>storage capacities of the local depot</>.

text.cn: 搭建<@ld.key>滑索</>可以提高货物运送玩法的完成效率，以及<@ld.key>降低货物受损风险</>。
text.en: Construct and place <@ld.key>zipline facilities</> to improve the efficiency of the goods delivery game mode, and reduce the <@ld.key>risks of goods damage</>.

text.cn: 在<@ld.key>货物装箱</>中将货物运送至目标后，有可能收到<@ld.key>感谢信</>，那是对你辛苦付出的真诚谢意。
text.en: After using the <@ld.key>Pack Goods</> feature and delivering the goods to the target, you might receive a <@ld.key>letter of gratitude</>. The sender is clearly sincere about thanking you for your hard work.

text.cn: 武陵对生态环境十分重视，在环境监测终端接取<@ld.key>监测委托</>并在对应地点<@ld.key>拍照</>，可以获得调度券等报酬。
text.en: Wuling places great value on their natural ecosystems. Use the Environment Monitoring Terminal to accept and complete <@ld.key>monitoring jobs</> and <@ld.key>take photographs</> at the required locations to earn stock bills and other rewards.

text.cn: 和<@ld.key>据点进行交易</>，可以获得据点所在地区的<@ld.key>调度券</>。但需要小心，部分据点的发展会导致敌人的觊觎。
text.en: <@ld.key>Trade with outposts</> to earn <@ld.key>stock bills</> of the outposts' regions. Be careful, though. Some outposts may attract enemy attention when they become more prosperous.

text.cn: 提升所在地区的<@ld.key>建设等级</>，可提高地区矿物的<@ld.key>产率</>、增加工业<@ld.key>设施放置的上限</>并获得丰富奖励。
text.en: Raise the <@ld.key>regional development level</> to improve <@ld.key>mineral productivity</>, place more <@ld.key>AIC Factory facilities</>, and earn generous rewards.

text.cn: 提升所在地区的建设等级，可使用协议核心的<@ld.key>跨区域传输功能</>，将所在地区的工业产物<@ld.key>传输到其他地区</>。
text.en: Raising the regional development level also makes <@ld.key>Regional Transfer</> of the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) available, allowing you to <@ld.key>transfer AIC products from one region to another</>.

text.cn: <@ld.key>每天维护</>他人的共享设备，可以增加这些共享设备的存在时长。
text.en: Shared facilities from other players can be <@ld.key>repaired on a daily basis</> to extend their duration.

text.cn: 即使他人的共享设备消失了，管理员也不必担心，<@ld.key>新的共享设备会定期出现。</>
text.en: Do not worry when a shared facility disappears. <@ld.key>New shared facilities will appear on a regular basis</>, Endmin.

text.cn: <@ld.key>干员晋升和技能升级</>所需要的部分珍贵材料只能通过<@ld.key>采集或在帝江号培养舱培养</>获得。
text.en: Certain rare materials for <@ld.key>operator promotion and skill upgrades</> can only be <@ld.key>gathered or cultivated at the OMV Dijiang Growth Chamber</>.

text.cn: 前往<@ld.key>好友飞船</>，可以<@ld.key>参观</>对方展示的武器、干员、蚀刻章以及陈列品等内容。
text.en: Visiting a <@ld.key>friend's ship</> is a chance to <@ld.key>admire</> the weapons, operators, engraved medals, and display items of their showcase.

text.cn: 前往好友飞船进行<@ld.key>生产助力可获取信用</>；在<@ld.key>采购中心 - 信用交易所</>处，可花费信用<@ld.key>兑换干员武器</>养成材料等重要资源。
text.en: While visiting a friend's ship, you can <@ld.key>provide production assist to earn credits</>. Credits can be exchanged at <@ld.key>Acquisition Center - Credit Store</> for important resources such as <@ld.key>operator and weapon progression materials</>.

text.cn: 在帝江号中央环厅的<@ld.key>干员联络台</>处，可以将指定<@ld.key>干员快速召集到身边</>。
text.en: The <@ld.key>Operator Contact Panel</> at the Dijiang Central Ring can be used to quickly <@ld.key>call a selected operator to your side</>.

text.cn: 旅途中收集到的<@ld.key>陈列品</>可以在帝江号的行迹高塔中<@ld.key>放置展示</>，方便干员们和来访好友进行参观。
text.en: <@ld.key>Display items</> collected during your journey can be <@ld.key>placed and showcased</> at the Tower of Trails aboard Dijiang. They can then be admired by operators and visiting friends.

text.cn: 使用好友飞船上的<@ld.key>物资调度终端，</>可查看对方的弹性需求物资价格，并以该价格<@ld.key>出售自身的库存货品</>。
text.en: Use the <@ld.key>Stock Redistribution Terminal</> aboard your friend's ship to check the prices of elastic goods, and sell <@ld.key>your stockpile of goods</> at their prices.

text.cn: 在帝江号中可与干员们进行日常交流，向干员们<@ld.key>赠送礼物</>还可以<@ld.key>提升信赖关系</>。
text.en: Chat with your operators aboard Dijiang and give them <@ld.key>gifts</> to <@ld.key>raise their trust</> in you.

text.cn: 将干员进驻到帝江号的<@ld.key>功能舱室</>，可以定期生产<@ld.key>干员培养素材、武器培养素材</>等重要资源。
text.en: Assign operators into various <@ld.key>functional cabins</> aboard Dijiang to produce important resources that include <@ld.key>operator and weapon progression materials</>.

text.cn: 当干员进驻帝江号时干员心情会随进驻时间而变化。当<@ld.key>心情耗尽后</>将停止工作并<@ld.key>自行前往休息</>，当心情恢复后会自行返回工作。
text.en: The mood of operators assigned to Dijiang functional cabins will decrease over time. When <@ld.key>mood is depleted</>, operators will <@ld.key>automatically leave their work area to rest</>, and automatically return to their work when mood is restored.

text.cn: 帝江号的<@ld.key>总控中枢</>是控制着帝江号大小各类系统的中枢设备，<@ld.key>提升总控中枢等级</>可以开启更多建设内容。
text.en: The <@ld.key>Control Nexus</> controls all major and minor systems of OMV Dijiang. <@ld.key>Level up the Nexus</> to unlock more construction options.

text.cn: 有空记得回帝江号看看<@ld.key>干员们</>，说不定可以收到他们送的<@ld.key>小礼物</>。
text.en: Talk to your <@ld.key>operators</> aboard Dijiang when you have time. They might have some <@ld.key>presents</> for you.

text.cn: 在帝江号<@ld.key>会客室</>中，可以自由展示<@ld.key>已获得的武器、干员和蚀刻章</>。
text.en: The Dijiang <@ld.key>Reception Room</> lets you showcase <@ld.key>weapons, operators, and engraved medals you have acquired</>.

text.cn: 在帝江号<@ld.key>静滞核心</>处，可以随时<@ld.key>切换管理员身份</>。
text.en: Switch the <@ld.key>Endmin's identity</> at the Dijiang <@ld.key>Stasis Core</>.

text.cn: 可通过帝江号会客室前往<@ld.key>好友飞船</>，进行<@ld.key>游览参观、生产助力、出售货品</>等活动。
text.en: Use the Dijiang Reception Room to visit your <@ld.key>friend's ship</> and <@ld.key>tour their facilities, provide production assists, and sell various goods</>.

text.cn: 击败的<@ld.key>敌人越强</>，所掉落的<@ld.key>基质品质越稀有</>。
text.en: Defeating <@ld.key>stronger enemies</> may give you <@ld.key>better essences</>.

text.cn: <@ld.key>升级武器</>，可提高武器基础攻击力；<@ld.key>突破武器</>，可提升武器等级上限与武器技能等级。
text.en: <@ld.key>Upgrade a weapon</> to raise its Base Attack. Tune the weapon to raise its <@ld.key>level cap</> and weapon skill level.

text.cn: 每把武器具有多个<@ld.key>武器技能</>，为武器注入<@ld.key>基质可提升武器技能等级</>。
text.en: Every weapon comes with several <@ld.key>weapon skills</>. Infusing an <@ld.key>essence may raise the weapon skill level</>.

text.cn: 武器分为<@ld.key>多种类型</>，每位干员<@ld.key>仅被允许使用一种类型</>的武器。
text.en: There are <@ld.key>many types</> of weapons, but operators are <@ld.key>only allowed to wield a single type</>.

text.cn: 在为干员选择装备时，建议优先考虑<@ld.key>与干员主能力相匹配</>的装备，以便最大限度地发挥干员的作战能力。
text.en: When equipping your operators, gear that <@ld.key>match the operators' main attributes</> will make good choices for maximizing their combat performances.

text.cn: 探索等级会影响干员等级上限、各地区敌人等级、稀有采集物与稀有矿物的存在数量上限和每日刷新数量、能量淤积点状态、协议空间、危境再现等。
text.en: Exploration Level affects: operator level caps; enemy levels in various areas; availability and daily refreshes of rare gatherables and rare minerals; Energy Alluvium statuses; Protocol Spaces; and RE-Crisis stages.

text.cn: 管理员可以<@ld.key>主动降低探索等级</>，但每次降低后的<@ld.key>24小时内无法再次降低</>。
text.en: Exploration Level can be <@ld.key>manually lowered</>, but there is a <@ld.key>24-hour cooldown to lower it again</>.
